title: Acquire the Gauntlets for Helsik
content:
closed to you forever. You may avoid giving the gauntlets back by letting her know everything you took from the House of Hope is yours. She will originally be angry and state you had a deal. With a DC 10 Intimidation check, she will swiftly change her mind. This is the only method that you can use other than giving her the gauntlets where you can still purchase from her shop afterwards. Heroic companions such as Wyll and Karlach will disapprove of your methods of intimidation.
